Posts.Content: I had something similar to this once , not as expensive. But it worked a treat.
Posts.Title: Any tips on ways to get some sleep after lumpectomy?

Posts.Content: Although I only had a single mastectomy, I. Made a heart shaped pillow, which tucked around my side and breast comfortably, also I have a soft blanket which I scrunch up to stop me rolling about and were it under my chest and tummy.  Hope she finds something to help. Lack of sleep is not a nice thing. Good luck.
